de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.server

Interface IServerEmailCheck


  • public interface IServerEmailCheck
    Used in the requeue cancelation thread. In the operator administration panel can be set the requeue cancelation time. If the question reserved for the user wasn't processed in this time, the question will be assigned to the subproject. It can be useful if the operator is taking a vacation.
    was:
    ServerEmailCheck.java

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean postRequeueRemoval(Connection con, Question question, int agent, Hashtable<String,Object> ht)
      Will be called after the question has been assigned to the subproject.
      boolean preRequeueRemoval(Connection con, Question question, int agent, Hashtable<String,Object> ht)
      Is called before a requeue of an operator will be removed and will be assigned to the agent.

    • Method Detail

      • preRequeueRemoval

        boolean preRequeueRemoval(Connection con,
                        Question question,
                        int agent,
                        Hashtable<String,Object> ht)
        Is called before a requeue of an operator will be removed and will be assigned to the agent.
        Parameters:
        con - - Connection of a Database
        question - the requeued question
        agent - the agent whom the question is requeued
        ht - not currently used
        Returns:
        true if the question will be assigned to the operator, false otherwise
